remarks: A continuous function ` F ` on an open interval ` ( A (,) B ) ` with a finite right limit ` R ` in ` A ` and a finite left limit ` L ` in ` B ` is integrable.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
iblcncfioo.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
iblcncfioo.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
iblcncfioo.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( ( A (,) B ) -cn-> CC ) ) $.
iblcncfioo.l $e |- ( ph -> L e. ( F limCC B ) ) $.
iblcncfioo.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. ( F limCC A ) ) $.
iblcncfioo $p |- ( ph -> F e. L^1 ) $.
